abstract: A group of visual marks that a chart draws to indicate the composition of a chart’s axes.

# AxisMarks

**Structure**

A group of visual marks that a chart draws to indicate the composition of a chart’s axes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AxisMarks<Content> where Content : AxisMark
```

## Supporting types

- **AxisMarkPreset**: Describes preset styles for axis markers.
- **AxisMarkValues**: Describes the values the axis markers will present (one for each value).
- **AxisMarkPosition**: Describes the position of axis markers.

## Initializers

- **init(format:preset:position:values:stroke:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers. Default content will be used for the axis markers.
- **init(format:preset:position:values:stroke:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers. Default content will be used for the axis markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:content:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:content:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:content:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties,will override default markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:content:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties,will override default markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:stroke:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers. Default content will be used for the axis markers.
- **init(preset:position:values:stroke:)**: Creates axis markers with the given properties, will override default markers. Default content will be used for the axis markers.

## Axes

- **Customizing axes in Swift Charts**: Improve the clarity of your chart by configuring the appearance of its axes.
- **ChartAxisContent**: A view that represents a chart’s axis.
- **AxisContent**: A type that represents the elements you use to build a chart’s axes.
- **AnyAxisContent**: A type-erased element of a chart’s axis.
- **AxisContentBuilder**: A result builder that constructs axis content.

## Conforms To

- AxisContent
